game.title: Slug Slasher
game.description: Slug Slasher is a 2D action platformer where the player takes on the role of a chef who must defend the world from an onslaught of giant slugs with only his trusty bucket of salt. Featuring vibrant visuals, satisfying and punchy sound design, and classic side-scrolling platformer beat-em-up gameplay, the game is sure to charm even the saltiest souls both young and old.

history.header: From Rags to Slightly Fancier Rags
history.text: Slug Slasher started out as a project within Indiana University's Hoosier Games game development club. Development has continued for about a year and is due to finish during the summer of 2018.

features.feature: Classic punchy 2D action platformer gameplay enjoyable by veterans and newcomers alike
Over-the-top characters, environments, and situations packed with personality and filled to the brim with fun, engaging mechanics
Satisfying sounds supplementing your slug slashing soirées
